text: Time Warp Trio is a Canadian-American animated television series. It is based on the children's book series of the same name. It was created by Jon Scieszka. It was produced by WGBH Boston in association with Soup2Nuts. The series aired from July 9, 2005, to July 15, 2006, on Discovery Kids' Saturday morning block on NBC. title: Time Warp Trio
